projects.title: HooBank Application
projects.description: Hoobank is a sleek and user-friendly landing page for a modern banking service. With its intuitive design and informative layout, users can easily navigate through various sections, including potential clients and details about offered services.

projects.title: Gericht Restaurant Application
projects.description: Landing page for Gericht Restaurant. Features captivating visuals, user-friendly menu, booking integration, and key information. Showcases restaurant's identity and enhances user experience.

projects.title: GPT-3 Application
projects.description: GPT-3 Application, an innovative showcase of AI's potential. Dive into real-world case studies unveiling GPT-3's versatility. Explore detailed insights into what GPT-3 is and its transformative impact. Join us on a journey of discovery at the intersection of technology and creativity, where possibilities are limitless

projects.title: Article Summarizer
projects.description: The AI Article Summarizer Web App is a groundbreaking project that combines the cutting-edge capabilities of RapidAPI's Article Extractor and Summarizer to simplify the process of digesting extensive written content. With its user-friendly, this web app offers a valuable solution for anyone seeking to optimize their reading and research workflows.

projects.title: Nike Landing Page
projects.description: This website is a landing page for the Nike brand. It showcases a modern and stylish design that represents the brand's identity. The landing page may include various sections such as product highlights, brand information, and more.

projects.title: Online Reservation System
projects.description: The Online Reservation System project, a JavaFX application for booking train tickets online. This project provides a user-friendly interface for users to log in, register, book train tickets, and check booking status.

projects.title: Space Tourism Website
projects.description: Explore celestial wonders with our Space Tourism website. Embark on extraordinary journeys to Mars, Europa, and beyond, guided by expert crew members well-versed in interplanetary travel. Our cutting-edge technology ensures safe and awe-inspiring adventures, making space tourism a reality like never before. Discover the universe's beauty with us.
